Summary: after last sat..event.i bein watchingsame..area and they came back...
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailsat work talking to mechanic..i saw objects last week...so ive bein watching... i beleived the object was a ufo ive seen them before.. different one i personaly have had about 20 sightings..the first object was a basketball sized white ball it just appeared out of the blue skymoved..around seaveral different directions then dissappeared...it did this about 4 to 5 times in a 5 minute window...the second object started as a white ball and turned sideways toward the sun you could see the sun reflection on its right side shiny silver color..as it turned further left it turneda medium gun metal grey color ..i saw this object 3 times in a5 to 7 minute window..the 3rd objectwas triangle shaped was grey to medium black in color..appeared as a whit dot coming straight at me i put up my binoculars and it seemed to stop and was watching me..after 3minutes it got bigger it was 500feet from tip to tail both side there was a pale round light on the front tip back corners and 1 light between tip and tail on both sides..all three of these objects simple vanished.. the4th object was very dark black.round saucer shaped simply appeared in the sky it had a very dark red\orange light emmitting around its outer edge.moved to my right tipped left slowly moved left..at the top of this object was 4\5 spike shaped points protruding from it s top.it simply vanished..
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Ellicott City
There were no other sightings in Ellicott City on or around November 1st 2013
